name: Indian Train Driver 2018
description:
Tired of driving hi-tech vehicles and want a taste of old age steam engines and driving in beautiful Indian Landscapes, driving in the picturesque backdrops and valleys will take you to your childhood, early 90’s and 80’s. Transport passengers from one city to another and be on time to transport and reach the station to pick and drop passengers.
This train driving simulator gives smooth controls and transport missions in the beautiful Indian valleys. You as a driver has the responsibility to reach on time to the destined railway station. Drive the locomotive vehicles and be the front man to drive train on subway tracks.

Key Features of Indian Train Driver 2018:

Smooth Driving Controls
Village and Valley landscape
Open world Terrain
Picturesque landscapes like mountain, villages, valleys etc.
HD Graphics

Rate and review for feedback and suggestions for updates!
